publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4608 Alex Johnstone: Montrose Academyâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Montrose Academy on their success in winning the National Youth Parliament Competition for the second year running; notes that a Montrose Academy pupil was also voted best non-executive spokesperson; commends all the teams on their hard work and preparation, and hopes that the contestants will continue to take an active role in society and encourage their peers to do the same.
S2M-4608 Montrose Academy (lodged on 23 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4608 Montrose Academy (lodged on 23 June 2006) Mr David Davidson*
